stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  GRADED BY FEW THINGS
comments: Prof. Golaski is a knowledgeable, somewhat scattered lecturer. You have to pay attention to the lectures themselves because you\'ll be lost if you tune out and just write what\'s on the board. Our class was only graded on 4 (easy) tests and one paper, so the workload was manageable throughout the semester. I have no reason not to recommend his class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Hilarious (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Golaski was by the best part time professor Ive taken at ccsu. His lecturing is always so in-depth that you dont need to actually read anything to pass which is nice when the workload gets heavier throughout the semester. He makes an 8am enjoyable. Tests are super easy. 5 questions each and the final takes questions from previous tests

comments: The best English professor I\'ve had the two years I\'ve been here! This was my second time having him and he just gets funnier eve. He makes 8am classes not so dreadful. He really does understand the material he teaches and encourages discussions. His exams are very easy, if you study and he goes over each question right before we take the test!

stu_tags: AMAZING LECTURES  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  HILARIOUS
comments: Awesome professor. Class time was 8am but I didn\'t mind going because his lectures were funny - kept me awake. Only 3 tests, super easy if you go to every class. On the review day he basically tells you what the questions are going to be. Will take again for sure.

stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GET READY TO READ
comments: This guy is great. Beware of the fact that he tries to make students drop the course in the beginning by making the class seem SO scary. Chill. There\'s a lot of reading and sometimes he makes everyone read from the text aloud. He\'s knowledgeable and even gets some authors to come and read for the class. Bottom line, come to class and put in effort

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Hilarious (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
stu_tags: HILARIOUS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  GET READY TO READ
comments: Awesome prof. Recognizes that a lot of people are uninterested in his class but makes it interesting. Doesn\'t take attendance. Two essays, midterm and final. Even if you don\'t understand the readings, read anyway because he will make you understand in a modern way.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Hilarious (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Sooooooooooooooooo easy! There\'s only 4 papers you have to write which are big toward your grade. Doesn\'t take attendance, no quizzes. If he doesn\'t like you then you\'re screwed, bases grades on if you actually come since he doesn\'t take attendance. Really cool dude and knows a lot of interesting stuff. Never a boring class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Hilarious (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: I have taken Adam Golaski for all of my English courses at CCSU! I never read once, this is because after every reading assignment he would go over exactly what happened in the book and what you should remember! Just show up to every class, listen and take notes. you will absolutely pass without a problem!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Hilarious (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: This class he didn\'t give us any tests. Just writing projects. He\'s an easy grader and if you do the homework, and the assignments in your notebook, you will pass.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Hilarious (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Great proff. Attendance not mandatory but he gives exact answers to exams out in class, and the answers aren\'t things you would just know from reading the books. 3 exams at 20% each and 1 paper at 40% for final grade. Oh and also he\'s gorgeous :)

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Hilarious (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Professor Golaski is great. He assigns readings for every class but you don\'t need to do them since his lectures are so in-depth. There are only two easy assignments and 3 exams. The exams are entirely based on his lectures so just going to class and taking good notes will pretty much guarantee a good grade.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Hilarious (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Professor Golaski is the man. He\'s really personable, tries to relate concepts to history and current events or trends. I\'m so sad I can\'t take him a third time. Listen, speak up, read and take notes because that is how you\'ll pass. He is willing to sit down with you if you\'re a very active participant and don\'t do well on tests.

comments: The best teacher ever. Wish could have him for all my classes

comments: He\'s a cool teacher. Before class he likes to make idle chit chat with the students who come in early, mostly about music. I don\'t think he is a tough grader, but he will put questions that most of the class got wrong on the from other exams on the final exam. But he will tell you what he expects, so believe him

comments: over-rated. for the most part he lectures all class - is more interested in his own opinions and talking than having students talk. definitely a dry, somewhat boring sense of humor. passed the class, but I would not recommend him.

comments: Great teacher, available, fair grading, interesting.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Hilarious (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: He\'s so funny and charming, you almost don\'t mind the lectures. Notes are really important, so try to attend. One easy assignment and one poetry paper. Exams are not bad as long as you listen and take notes when he tells you it will be on the exam! Would definitely take him again.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Hilarious (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: One of the best professors I\'ve had. Took him a second time. Be sure to read to get a better understanding of the material. Go to class and take notes of what is on the board and what he says, most of that will help you for the test. Go to all classes it really helps. Go to the class before a test and he tells you what will basically be on it.
